item.title: StargateNX Review
item.description: Welcome back to another post! Today, I will be reviewing StargateNX, a new paid homebrew software for the switch and the SXPro. What is it? StargateNX is a new software solution provided as a plugin for SX Installer that allows you to download and install different packages for the console. Developed by the stargate team, it follows a kind of SAAS (Software as a Service) model, with a monthly subscription.
